metadata.title: CVE-2022-3598 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.description:
LibTIFF 4.4.0 has an out-of-bounds write in extractContigSamplesShifted24bits in tools/tiffcrop.c:3604, allowing attackers to cause a denial-of-service via a crafted tiff file. For users that compile libtiff from sources, the fix is available with commit cfbb883b.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-3598` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libtiff-opengl - 4.4.0-4ubuntu3.1
libtiff-tools - 4.4.0-4ubuntu3.1
libtiff5 - 4.4.0-4ubuntu3.1
libtiffxx5 - 4.4.0-4ubuntu3.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: tiff package in kinetic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.4.0-4ubuntu3.1').
